description.en: LeoFinance is a social media community that distributes LEO/wLEO/bLEO to authors and curators as tokenized rewards. The bLEO token is a BSC-bridge to our main chain token (LEO) on the Hive blockchain. Users earn tokenized rewards on our platform and can withdraw them as either wLEO (ERC20), bLEO(BSC) or LEO (Hive).
